verses.verse: וְאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh, now these הַבָּאִ֤ים <WH935> hab-ba-'Im Now these [are] they that came אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> da-Vid to David לְצִ֣יקְלַ֔ג <WH6860> le-Tzi-ke-Lag, to Ziklag ע֣וֹד <WH5750> od was still עָצ֔וּר <WH6113> 'a-Tzur, while he yet kept himself close מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei because שָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul of Saul בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son קִ֑ישׁ <WH7027> Kish; of Kish וְהֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> ve-Hem-mah were among בַּגִּבּוֹרִ֔ים <WH1368> bag-gib-bo-Rim, and they [were] among the mighty men עֹזְרֵ֖י <WH5826> 'o-ze-Rei helpers הַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> ham-mil-cha-Mah. of the war

נֹ֣שְׁקֵי <WH5401> No-she-kei [They were] armed קֶ֗שֶׁת <WH7198> Ke-shet, with bows מַיְמִינִ֤ים <WH3231> may-mi-Nim and could use both the right hand וּמַשְׂמִאלִים֙ <WH8041> u-mas-mi-Lim and the left בָּֽאֲבָנִ֔ים <WH68> ba-'a-va-Nim, in [hurling] stones וּבַחִצִּ֖ים <WH2671> u-va-chitz-Tzim and [shooting] arrows בַּקָּ֑שֶׁת <WH7198> bak-Ka-shet; out of a bow מֵאֲחֵ֥י <WH251> me-'a-Chei brethren שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul [even] of Saul's מִבִּנְיָמִֽן׃ <WH1144> mib-bin-ya-Min. of Benjamin

הָרֹ֨אשׁ <WH7218> ha-Rosh The chief אֲחִיעֶ֜זֶר <WH295> 'a-chi-'E-zer [was] Ahiezer וְיוֹאָ֗שׁ <WH3101> ve-yo-'Ash, then Joash בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> be-Nei the sons הַשְּׁמָעָ֣ה <WH8094> hash-she-ma-'Ah of Shemaah הַגִּבְעָתִ֔י <WH1395> hag-giv-'a-Ti, the Gibeathite; וִיזוּאֵל vi-zu-'el כוִיזִיאֵ֥ל <WH3149> vi-zi-'El Jeziel קוָפֶ֖לֶט <WH6404> va-Fe-let and Pelet בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei the sons עַזְמָ֑וֶת <WH5820> 'az-Ma-vet; of Azmaveth וּבְרָכָ֕ה <WH1294> u-ve-ra-Chah and Berachah וְיֵה֖וּא <WH3058> ve-ye-Hu and Jehu הָעֲנְּתֹתִֽי׃ <WH6069> ha-'an-ne-to-Ti. the Antothite

וְיִֽשְׁמַֽעְיָ֧ה <WH3460> ve-yish-ma'-Yah And Ismaiah הַגִּבְעוֹנִ֛י <WH1393> hag-giv-'o-Ni the Gibeonite גִּבּ֥וֹר <WH1368> gib-Bor a mighty man בַּשְּׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <WH7970> bash-she-lo-Shim among the thirty וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and over הַשְּׁלֹשִֽׁים׃ <WH7970> hash-she-lo-Shim. and over the thirty

וְיִרְמְיָ֤ה <WH3414> ve-yir-me-Yah Jeremiah וְיַחֲזִיאֵל֙ <WH3166> ve-ya-cha-zi-'El Jahaziel וְי֣וֹחָנָ֔ן <WH3076> ve-Yo-cha-Nan, Jehohanan וְיוֹזָבָ֖ד <WH3107> ve-yo-za-Vad Josabad הַגְּדֵרָתִֽי׃ <WH1452> hag-ge-de-ra-Ti. Gederathite

אֶלְעוּזַ֤י <WH498> 'el-'u-Zai Eluzai וִירִימוֹת֙ <WH3406> vi-ri-mOt Jermoth וּבְעַלְיָ֣ה <WH1183> u-ve-'al-Yah Bealiah וּשְׁמַרְיָ֔הוּ <WH8114> u-she-mar-Ya-hu, Shamariah וּשְׁפַטְיָ֖הוּ <WH8203> u-she-fat-Ya-hu Shephatiah; הַחֲרִיפִי ha-cha-ri-fi כהַחֲרוּפִֽי׃ <WH2741> ha-cha-ru-Fi. Haruphite ק

אֶלְקָנָ֡ה <WH511> 'el-ka-Nah Elkanah וְ֠יִשִּׁיָּהוּ <WH3449> Ve-yish-shi-ya-hu Ishiah וַעֲזַרְאֵ֧ל <WH5832> va-'a-zar-'El Azarael וְיוֹעֶ֛זֶר <WH3134> ve-yo-'E-zer Joezer וְיָשָׁבְעָ֖ם <WH3434> ve-ya-sha-ve-'Am Jashobeam הַקָּרְחִֽים׃ <WH7145> hak-ka-re-Chim. Korahite

וְיוֹעֵאלָ֧ה <WH3132> ve-yo-'e-Lah Joelah וּזְבַדְיָ֛ה <WH2069> u-ze-vad-Yah Zebadiah בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei afflicted יְרֹחָ֖ם <WH3395> ye-ro-Cham Jeroham מִן־ min- הַגְּדֽוֹר׃ <WH1446> hag-ge-Dor. Gedor

וּמִן־ u-min- הַגָּדִ֡י <WH1425> hag-ga-Di Gadites נִבְדְּל֣וּ <WH914> niv-de-Lu make אֶל־ 'el- דָּוִיד֩ <WH1732> da-Vid David לַמְצַ֨ד <WH4679> lam-Tzad castle מִדְבָּ֜רָה <WH4057> mid-Ba-rah desert גִּבֹּרֵ֣י <WH1368> gib-bo-Rei champion הַחַ֗יִל <WH2428> ha-Cha-yil, able אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH376> 'an-Shei he צָבָא֙ <WH6635> tza-Va appointed time לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> lam-mil-cha-Mah, battle עֹרְכֵ֥י <WH6186> 'o-re-Chei array צִנָּ֖ה <WH6793> tzin-Nah buckler וָרֹ֑מַח <WH7420> va-Ro-mach; buckler וּפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> u-fe-Nei accept אַרְיֵה֙ <WH743> 'ar-Yeh Aridatha פְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> pe-nei-Hem, accept וְכִצְבָאיִ֥ם <WH6643> ve-chitz-va-Yim beautiful עַל־ 'al- הֶהָרִ֖ים <WH2022> he-ha-Rim hill לְמַהֵֽר׃ <WH4116> le-ma-Her. be carried headlong ס sa-Mek
